author: akyar.ozgur
title: Eco SPOs to support Climate Action
description: Energy consumption of blockchains is on of the main question to the communities who aren't aware of Cardano.
solution: Increasing community understanding about Eco-friendly staking and helping independent SPOs to promote and prove legitimacy.
experience: Computer Engineer, Educator, Researcher. Enjoying civic engagement throughout volunteering in NGOs. So I can bridge the gap:)
